transcript: Shouldn't they have like told us about that? I mean, why why would they make me go and wait three out if I got to go and do it again?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Shouldn't they have like told us about that? I mean why - why would they make me go and wait three hours if I have got to go and do it again?
